title: Per capita consumption of high fructose corn syrup in the U.S. 2000 to 2018
summary: Overall Per capita consumption in pounds has constant over the Year.
Per capita consumption in pounds is roughly increasing from 2000 to 2002.
The steepest increase occurs in between the Year 2000 and 2001.
Maximum Per capita consumption in pounds, about 62.5 was reported at Year 2000, and 2002
The lowest Per capita consumption in pounds, of value 62.2 was reported at Year 2001
